Title: Authorizes certain taxpayers who are entitled to a one hundred percent rebate of certain stock transfer taxes not to pay such taxes
Summary: Authorizes certain taxpayers who are entitled to a one hundred percent rebate of certain stock transfer taxes not to pay such taxes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing certain taxpayers who are entitled to a one hundred percent rebate of certain stock transfer taxes not to pay such taxes
